fields.description:
Jenkins on Java8 is failing due to a number of Javadoc violations that are now considered ERRORs in the following classes:
- AuthenticationFilter.java
- CertificateUtil.java
- RolloverSignerSecretProvider.java
- SignerSecretProvider.java
- ZKSignerSecretProvider.java
- KeyAuthorizationKeyProvider.java
fields.summary: [JDK8] AuthenticationFilter, CertificateUtil, SignerSecretProviders, KeyAuthorizationKeyProvider Javadoc issues
